result.arabic_text: ۞ قَوۡلٞ مَّعۡرُوفٞ وَمَغۡفِرَةٌ خَيۡرٞ مِّن صَدَقَةٖ يَتۡبَعُهَآ أَذٗىۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَنِيٌّ حَلِيمٞ
result.translation: 263. Meqe yaabay maggom kallaci aba numul gacsaanaa kee Qafu kaah Abaanam Sadqhatay woh koh Abee kee Adah Amo keenil yaxxeereenim katattak kayrih Aysuk Raqta, Yalli kay Naqoosa tacee Sadqhatak gaddali, Usuk xiqliiy kay Amri cina marih digaalat mayasissika.
